title: 820-00840 No power on USB ports
message:
Board was worked on before, U2800 and both CD3215 as well as the USB-C port/s were replaced and board worked fine for about 2 weeks, now it came back with 20V on both ports, no power on board and no power on USB ports, both for USB 3 and 2 there is no power.

U2800 and the small PI3USBxxxx chip were replaced, but no luck.

title: 820-00840 No power on USB ports
message:
"no power on board and no power on USB ports"
Do you mean the board doesn't turn on at all, just stays with 20V on USB-C input?

title: 820-00840 No power on USB ports
message: U2800 was shorted on 3v3s0 problem fixed, thanks!
